stringify: $(identity.pronouns.singular) $(frequency) complains about how cold the weather is.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is constantly talking about $(identity.pronouns.possesive) newest obsession.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) can often be found purring when happy.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has a very deep knowledge of unusual facts and events.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has a tendency to steal curious items to study them.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) knows everything there is to know about old prophecies.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) spends all of $(identity.pronouns.possesive) money on old baubles.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) can often be found narrating ongoing events.
